# SubSnooze

> ADHD-friendly subscription tracker. Stop paying the ADHD tax on subscriptions.

## What is SubSnooze?

SubSnooze is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that helps people with ADHD track and manage their subscriptions. It sends timely reminders before renewals so you never forget to cancel unwanted subscriptions again.

## Key Features

- Subscription tracking with automatic renewal reminders
- 3-touch reminder system: 7, 3, and 1 days before renewal
- Push notifications, email reminders, and SMS alerts
- One-tap cancel redirect to service cancellation pages
- Cancel verification flow to confirm cancellation went through
- ADHD-friendly UX: max 3 options per screen, shame-free messaging, "Decide Later" always available

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 15 (App Router), React 19, TypeScript
- Supabase (database + auth)
- Firebase Cloud Messaging (push notifications)
- Tailwind CSS v4
